nodes.documentation:
The number of decimals of the currency represented by this Oracle,
it should be the most common number of decimal places

nodes.documentation:
The base token on which the sample is returned
should be the RCN Token address.

nodes.documentation: The name of the Individual or Company in charge of this Oracle

devdoc.author: Agustin Aguilar
devdoc.details: Defines the interface of a standard Diaspore RCN Oracle, The contract should also implement it's ERC165 interface: 0xa265d8e0

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Interface identification is specified in ERC-165. This function  uses less than 30,000 gas.

params.interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

supportsInterface(bytes4).return: `true` if the contract implements `interfaceID` and  `interfaceID` is not 0xffffffff, `false` otherwise

currency().notice: The currency symbol encoded on a UTF-8 Hex

decimals().notice: The number of decimals of the currency represented by this Oracle, it should be the most common number of decimal places

maintainer().notice: The name of the Individual or Company in charge of this Oracle

name().notice: Descriptive name of the currency, Ej: Ethereum

readSample(bytes).notice: Returns a sample on how many token() are equals to how many currency()

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface

symbol().notice: 3 or 4 letters symbol of the currency, Ej: ETH

token().notice: The base token on which the sample is returned should be the RCN Token address.

url().notice: Returns the url where the oracle exposes a valid "oracleData" if needed

userdoc.notice: Each oracle can only support one currency
